attributes.action: Make the misuse of the educator privilege at any level, a criminal offence.
attributes.background: All educators are implicitly given a unique position of trust by their students who arrive with minds open to receive knowledge. It is an abuse of trust and power for an educator to use that advantage to impart ideas the students had not attended for, particularly with respect to political ideas.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
